{{NPC infobox |game = poe2 |name = Bauha |image = Portrait Generic Wahaki Slave Convo.png |image2 = PE2 Bauha.png |caption = |race = Aumaua |subrace = Island |gender = Female |culture = [Deadfire Archipelago](/deadfireArchipelago/) |background = |faction = [Huana](/huana/) |deity = |personality = |class = Barbarian |level = 12 |MIG = 17 |CON = 14 |DEX = 14 |PER = 12 |INT = 10 |RES = 10 |health = 267 |damage = 6-10 {{crush}} / 6-10 {{crush}} |accuracy = 55 / 55 |penetration = 7 / 7 |deflection = 48 |fortitude = 85 |reflex = 65 |will = 48 |dr = 7 |dr slash = 8 |dr crush = 6 |dr pierce = 8 |dr freeze = 5 |ability = [Among the Waves](/amongTheWaves/), [Arms Bearer](/armsBearerDeadfire/), [Fast Runner](/fastRunnerDeadfire/), [Carnage](/carnageDeadfire/), [Blooded](/bloodedDeadfire/), [Thick Skinned](/thickSkinned/), [Bloody Slaughter](/bloodySlaughterDeadfire/), [One Stands Alone](/oneStandsAloneDeadfire/), [Blood Frenzy](/bloodFrenzy/), [Savage Defiance](/savageDefianceDeadfire/), [Crushing Blow](/crushingBlow/), [Leap](/leap/) |location = [Crookspur Dungeons](/crookspurDungeons/) |quests = [Clearing Out Crookspur](/clearingOutCrookspur/)
[Cruel Cargo](/cruelCargo/) |sells = |resting = |adventurers = |companion = |loot = |body = Mail Armor (Deadfire){{!}}Mail Armor |internalname = NPC_SP_Slave_Wahaki_Leader |guid = afd9622f-a41e-447b-84ac-2a8f60dc669d }} '''Bauha''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ## Background {{Description|A woman coated in dirt and flecking war paint waves her arm between the grimy cell's bars. Though weaponless and caged - wearing rags not fit for a pauper - she stands aggressively and has a muscular frame. It is obvious she is a warrior.}} Bauha is the sister of Aparo and a decorated Wahaki warrior, recently captured in an ambush by the Crookspur slavers. She is aching to give them a taste of her blade - or fists, or anything for that matter - and show them that all kith have a right to freedom. ## Interactions {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved = [Clearing Out Crookspur](/clearingOutCrookspur/)
[Cruel Cargo](/cruelCargo/) |none = |other = }} ## =Quests = * [Clearing Out Crookspur](/clearingOutCrookspur/), [Cruel Cargo](/cruelCargo/): She can aid in eliminating the slavers. [Category:Crookspur characters](/categoryCrookspurCharacters/)

[[Cruel Cargo]] |sells = |resting = |adventurers = |companion = |loot = |body = Mail Armor (Deadfire){{!}}Mail Armor |internalname = NPC_SP_Slave_Wahaki_Leader |guid = afd9622f-a41e-447b-84ac-2a8f60dc669d }} '''Bauha''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ==Background== {{Description|A woman coated in dirt and flecking war paint waves her arm between the grimy cell's bars. Though weaponless and caged - wearing rags not fit for a pauper - she stands aggressively and has a muscular frame. It is obvious she is a warrior.}} Bauha is the sister of Aparo and a decorated Wahaki warrior, recently captured in an ambush by the Crookspur slavers. She is aching to give them a taste of her blade - or fists, or anything for that matter - and show them that all kith have a right to freedom. ==Interactions== {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved = [[Clearing Out Crookspur]]
